text:
Dear Abbodi, what do you mean with EKB? If someone is on W11 21H2, wouldn't it
be easier to upgrade to 22H2, or wasn't this an enablement package. Cannot
recall anymore. Best regards, Karl Wester-Ebbinghaus Senior IT Consultant
-----Ursprüngliche Nachricht----- Von:  Im
Auftrag von Abbodii Gesendet: Donnerstag, 2. November 2023 14:50 An:
 Betreff: [patchmanagement] Re: 23H2 being
dribbled out on Windows update Yes you just need compatible 22H2 LCU version
(recommended 22621.2428, minimum 22621.2283) add the LCU, then add the EKB you
can use 22621.1 install.wim from scratch, or any updated 22621.xxxx install.wim
